resources.string:
BulletML is a conversion of the Kenta Cho BulletML demo for the Android Platform.


See 'About' for a link to the original demo.



Preferences



Difficulty



Set BulletML rank value..



Line Width



Draw line thickness. Does not currently work with OpenGL renderer.



OpenGL



Activate OpenGL renderer.



Show Profile



Show profiler results when you exit back to launch screen.
